entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly app fails with emscripten compiler options #35947
  • RoleExistsAsync method not working in Identity RoleManager #35946
  • Removing a document results in a lingering TagHelper #35945
    17.0-Preview4
  • Benchmark WorkspaceProjectStateChangeDetector and other highly dependent systems #35941
  • Fix Razor Apex Experimental test config #35940
    17.0-Preview4
  • ClickOnce support for AspNet+WinForm projects (Electron-like) #35935
  • Convert ProjectSnapshotChangeTrigger into an interface #35930
    Razor.Tooling
  • Prevent `InvokeVoidAsync` Return Value Serialization #35929
    6.0-rc2
  • How to pass a ComponentApplicationState to a component under test with bUnit? #35928
  • AddJsonOptions is run after Startup.Configure in integration tests #35923
  • 404 page with FallbackPolicy #35922
  • Send FLoC opt-out header by default #35921

Closed

  • API Review: WithTags, ITagsMetadata, TagsAttribute #35693
    6.0-rc2
  • Formatting @code block C# with extra block syntax can break formatting #34320
    17.0-Preview4
  • New templates have unnecessary using statement for OpenApi #35840
    6.0-rc2
  • Adding a new Razor component does not get picked up as a valid component until edit #33957
    17.0-Preview4
  • Remove RazorSemanticTokensLegendEndpoint #33119
    17.0-Preview4
  • EmailFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #35836
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup regression: plaintext #35912
  • Startup improvement: https #35895
  • Large app performance evaluation #31356
    17.0-Preview4
  • Blazor Hosted WebAssembly, Failing to resolve the route. #35589
  • Razor colorization issues #34770
    17.0-Preview4
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35865
    17.0-Preview4
  • [debugger][blazor webassembly] Breakpoints on server not hit #35773
  • dotnet watch can be extended #35837
  • View not found running on .Net6 rc1 #35452
  • Add return types to DI extension methods in SpaStaticFilesExtensions #35828
  • Server side validation message does not show inside a PartialView #35903
  • Styling issues in identity UI #35446
    6.0-rc2
  • UserManager.SetAuthenticationTokenAsync() is not updating an entity #35656
    Discussions
  • dotnet watch error - 'waiting for a file to change before restarting dotnet...' #35196
  • Write to response partially instead of all at once #35887
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #35881
  • Startup improvement: updates #35790
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #35894
  • [SignalR] IUserIdProvider's GetUserId has no async option #35417
  • enpoints.MapRazorPages() throwing an exception. #35365

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade Selenium Version #35949
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 6.0.100-rc.2.21430.28 #35948
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Update .NET SDK to 6.0.100-rc.2.21430.28 #35944
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3 with IIS #35934
    area-runtime
  • Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #35916
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Remove unusued using statement (fixes #35840) #35943
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35870
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • Remove unusued using statement (fixes #35840) #35841
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Reduce HttpRequestHeader enumerator allocations #32236
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Set Ephemeral DataProtection #35932
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff21b36` to `955c7f8` #35919
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [Templates] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates #35844
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35950
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update Components to use LoggerMessage #35585
    area-blazor
  • Stop Serializing Return Values for `InvokeVoidAsync` #35807
    area-blazor
  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Check for `null` Token in WASM Auth #35872
    area-blazor
  • Log time-taken more precisely #35863
    area-runtime
  • Use GetEndpoint extension method #35886
    area-mvc, area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35866
    area-mvc
  • onBoard package validation #35846
    area-infrastructure
  • Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #34598
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #35823
    area-runtime
